import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useSearchParams, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup} from 'react-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutStep from '../components/CheckoutStep' import {useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} {' '}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

) }
